title: Tried to explain math to r/leagueoflegends
body:
Suggested changing crit into a flat %increase in autoattack and certain abilities' (the ones that currently crit) damage because, on average, that is what crit is and a %amplification would smooth out the rocky area that exists right now where any botlane duel in the midgame is decided by who gets that 25% crit chance. 

It did not go well. 

"Crit makes for more dynanic gameplay and allows for really big plays when people adapt to changed situations"

"Crit should be left alone because changing it to your suggestion would make ADCs so underpowered and would make Lee Sin super broken"

"Omg you support giving free death caps out to AD champs lol completely break the game"

I suppose they're right. Crit is probably fine, after all, random mechanics like tripping in SSB are what make watching a professional E-sport dynamic and fun. In fact, bring back dodge. And while you're at it, introduce an item that has a .2% chance to kill a random enemy champion every second but which gives no stats, I'd buy five on Teemo. 

C'mon riot your players have spoken! Praise RNGsus!
